snippet.title: The Last Craftsman Trailer
snippet.description:
Get The Last Craftsman on Steam now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2238440/The_Last_Craftsman/

The Last Craftsman is a life-simulator where you get a new job in a town called Gear Springs.  You've got to manage the resources in the town and serve its residence all while thwarting the evil scheme of the previous Craftsman!  Collect tons of items and research them to learn how to craft even more items, spend a day leisurely fishing, make new friends in town, or guide your new robot friend through the mysterious ruins.

#indiegame #cozygaming
